title: Fuck MPCA
content: What the fuck was that dumb aah paper pls tell me I'm not the only one who thinks that paper was tough retarded subject

comments.body: For me also it was so bad , but my friends said it was easy ðŸ¥²
I'm done with isas, fuck allshit
Wdym it was so easy (i wanna end this pain) :)

Most of the questions, which had a Branch on condition did not even have a status update flag on any of the instructions. One of the MCQ was just straight up wrong, AND KT WAS A BASIC SPEEDUP CALCULATION
Yeah idk , the speed question options were wrong or smth
